description:
Hi, I'm Mitch also known around the web as iPhonecaptain. I was a school teacher for almost Twenty years. I had an accident in 2004 which left my right arm paralyzed so I had to stop teaching early. Fortunately, not too long after I stop teaching I began making videos and blogging on my site iPhonecaptain. That's where I began Jailbreaking and making tutorials for others.

If you found this Course helpful please consider donating on iPhonecaptain

I use my knowledge as a teacher to help get my point across in the video course here. I'm certain you will have better knowledge after taking this course. I have put together several years of techniques and strategies for Jailbreaking that will surely help you along the way.

Learn to Jailbreak iOS 8 from an expert. We share over 7 years of knowledge in this one course. We take you step by step through an entire Jailbreak of iOS 8.1 so you can understand how it should be done. I have jailbroken every iOS device Apple has released to date. I have a website devoted to Jailbreaking so we have been sharing this kind of content for many years.
title: Jailbreaking Strategies and Secrets for iOS 8 and Others
